data.name: Amplify Business
data.description: Amplify Business is a personal liability business credit card that rewards you for your business expenses. Earn something more rewarding with uncapped points on eligible business purchases.

features.additionalInfo: Up to 4 cards :Enjoy the flexibility of a personal liability credit card with up to 3 additional cardholders

features.additionalValue: Complimentary insurance : Including Transit Accident Insurance and Unauthorised Transaction Insurance

features.additionalInfo: 55 interest free days : Up to 55 days interest free on purchases when you pay the closing balance by statement due date each month.
Simplified tax reporting : Export expenses directly into MYOB and BAS or download as an Excel file to make analysis of business transactions easy
Personal liability business credit card that rewards you for your business expenses
Uncapped points : Earn uncapped points on business purchases including double points on international spending.
You would earn 2 Amplify points per dollar spent on Overseas purchases, 1 Amplify point per dollar spent on Australian purchases and 0.5 Amplify point per dollar spent on Government purchases
You would earn 1 Qantas points per dollar spent on Overseas purchases, 0.5 Qantas point per dollar spent on Australian purchases and 0.25 Qantas point per dollar spent on Government purchases

features.additionalValue: You can redeem your Amplify points for domestic and international flights on a variety of major airlines, as well as accommodation, holiday packages and car hire through Amplify Travel, Airline points or miles through Virgin Australia's Velocity program, Malaysia Airlines' Enrich program and Singapore Airlines' KrisFlyer program, rewards from a wide range of categories including appliances, gift cards, charitable donations, entertainment expenses and more

You can redeem your Qantas points for Classic Award flights on Qantas and 35 partner airlines, Qantas and Jetstar Any Seat Award flights, Flight Upgrade Awards on eligible Qantas flights when available, Over 3,000 products, experiences and vouchers from the online Qantas Store.

features.additionalInfo: We will provide you with a monthly statement (the actual date may vary slightly each month) for your card account.  If you: are registered for Online Banking, and have supplied us with a valid email address to send statement notifications to; satisfy any other applicable eligibility criteria, your statement will be available to you electronically through our Online Banking service, instead of receiving paper statements in the mail. You may elect to receive paper statements in the mail at any point.

Automatic Payment Plan : If the principal has an Automatic Payment Plan, we debit the payment specified on statement to the account selected for debiting under the Plan. We debit the payment 25 days after the statement date (or if that is not a banking day, then the next banking day).
Credit card payments can be paid via Phone banking, Internet banking, BPAY.
The product has EXTRA_REPAYMENTS option available.
RELATIONSHIP_MANAGEMENT is available for eligible customers.

Gambling Preference Request : For a card account, a primary cardholder can request us to decline transaction authorisation requests that we receive and that we are able to recognise as an authorisation request for a gambling transaction. A primary cardholder can make such a request (a 'Gambling Preference Request') by calling us or by another means offered by us from time to time. See our website for more information about this service and how to contact us.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Intend to use the card predominantly for business expenditure

eligibility.additionalValue: Should have an Australian Residential address

eligibility.additionalInfo: Per account. Discounted annual card fee in first year promotion Amplify Business: The first-year annual card fee waiver is available when you apply for a new Amplify Business credit card. The first annual card fee will be debited on the 12-month anniversary of the first transaction on your account and annually thereafter. This offer may be withdrawn at any time.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 3% of the Australian dollar value of any Foreign Transaction.

fees.name: Overlimit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $0 applied once per statement period if a transaction is made for an amount exceeding the available credit at the date the transaction is debited to your credit card account.

fees.name: Automatic payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: $0 applied once per statement period for each payment dishonoured made under the automatic payment plan.
